db:abstract.db:para: The QAudioOutputSelectorControl class provides an audio output selector media control.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The QAudioOutputSelectorControl class provides descriptions of the audio outputs available on a system and allows one to be selected as the audio output of a media service.
The interface name of QAudioOutputSelectorControl is org.qt-project.qt.audiooutputselectorcontrol/5.0 as defined in QAudioOutputSelectorControl_iid.

db:section.db:title: [explicit protected] QAudioOutputSelectorControl::QAudioOutputSelectorControl(QObject *parent = Q_NULLPTR)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new audio output selector control with the given parent.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QAudioOutputSelectorControl::~QAudioOutputSelectorControl()
db:section.db:para: Destroys an audio output selector control.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioOutputSelectorControl::activeOutput() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the currently selected audio output.

db:section.db:title: void QAudioOutputSelectorControl::activeOutputChanged(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Signals that the audio output has changed to name.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QString> QAudioOutputSelectorControl::availableOutputs() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of the names of the available audio outputs.

db:section.db:title: void QAudioOutputSelectorControl::availableOutputsChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signals that list of available outputs has changed.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioOutputSelectorControl::defaultOutput() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the default audio output.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAudioOutputSelectorControl::outputDescription(const QString &name) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the description of the output name.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QAudioOutputSelectorControl::setActiveOutput(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Set the active audio output to name.

db:section.db:title: QAudioOutputSelectorControl_iid
db:section.db:para: Defines the interface name of the QAudioOutputSelectorControl class.
